channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Food Drive to Support Campus food Pantry July 7th -11th
item.description: Date: Monday, July 7, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM - Celebrating the 1 year Anniversary of the opening of our on-campus Food pantry, We will be holding a week long food drive. Collecting Non perishable food items and Personal Hygiene items for the Campus Pantry. Donations can be dropped of at Off campus Commons 1525 15th street or email offcampus@rpi.edu to have items picked up.
item.author: Community

item.title: Analytics, Machine Learning & AI Information Session Hosted By Rensselaer at Work on July 8
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, July 8, 2025 7:00 PM - 7:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., on a 30-minute information session highlighting Rensselaer online, project-based graduate certificate programs in Analytics, Machine Learning & AI. Expect to learn how data can inform better decisions and review an analytic method that can be used regardless of the tools at hand. Please RSVP if you plan to attend.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
